note: The Genius Planner is a web and mobile application that allows busy people to manage and coordinate their lives— offering easy-to-read dashboards, intuitive setting of daily tasks and actions, daily time management, and goal tracking. For further guidance and support, the Mentor’s Portal helps you to share your life with your personal coach and get into flow. Earn fun rewards and deals from our trusted partners when you complete a goal. Track your life goal by App : https://app.geniusplanner.com
